dataaccess

Class SaleRowDataGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataaccess.SaleRowDataGateway

  • public class SaleRowDataGateway
extends java.lang.Object
    An in-memory representation of a row gateway for a sale row.
    Version:
    1.1 (4/10/2014)
    Author:
    fmartins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SaleRowDataGateway(int clientId, java.util.Date date)
      Creates a new sale given the client Id and the date it occurs.

      • getSaleById

        public static java.util.Optional<SaleRowDataGateway> getSaleById(int id)
        Fetches a sale with a given saleId and returns a sale row gateway object, in case it exists (Optional).
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the sale to find in the repository
        Returns:
        A sale row gateway object with the sale whose id matches saleId, in case it exists; otherwise it returns an empty optional value.
